+ General Attack : Attacks enemy units by shooting a number of long-range missiles and stuns them for a certain period of time. + Skill Attack : Lures enemy units to attack the robot by summoning a robot. ( Only lures air units and ranged units. ) + Special Ability 1 : Also targets and attacks ground melee units. ( Targets and attacks both melee and ranged units. ) + Special Ability 2 : Increases the basic speed of the game by 2%. ( If double speed is applied, the game speed increases by 2.04x cumulatively ) + Special Ability 3 : Increases the HP and defense power of all units by 2%. + Spirit Awakening : Maximum level-up increases by 5 for all units. ( [Spirit Awakening] is cumulative, but the maximum level-up for units cannot increase more than +100. Can also be activated in the Time Shop. )

Revival Team Setup
You can revive with the selected team's buff if you set up the revival team.

If you set up the revival team, you can revive as part of the selected team at the time of revival. ( Ex: If you select Dark Archer as part of the revival team, you can receive the buff effects of Dark Archer at the time of revival even if Dark Archer does not exist in your original team. )

You can earn medals while resting after ending the game.

Spirit rest is when the units stop marching to take a rest - While resting, you can acquire Medals. - You may enter Battle Arena, Guild War, Guild Raid, Spirit Highlands, Tower of Trial and dungeon even during the Spirit Rest. - To stop Spirit Rest, use [Premium Shop - Spirit Rest] menu. - Below is the Medal acquisition formula during the Spirit Rest.
Medals Acquired = Rest time(Min) x Medals per minute x 0.9
- [Medals per minute] is the number of medals acquired per minute on its highest efficiency on revival. (For example, acquiring 80,000 Medals after reviving in 40 minutes, the efficiency would be 2,000 per minute, and if acquiring 150,000 Medals after reviving in 50 minutes, the efficiency would be 3,000 per minute.) - However, Revival efficiency is only applied when the revival time is over 20 minutes. - Even if you rest more than 4 hours, [Rest Time] is only applied up to 4 hours

ui.BATTLEARENA_RULEDESC: Battle Arena is held every 4 days and is divided into 4 grades(S-league, A-League, B-league, and C-league). If you are in the top 50% at the end of a round you will move to the next league, if not you will remain where you are. The users that have advanced everyday will compete in the S-league on the 4th day. The user who takes first place on the 4th day will be entered into the Hall of Fame.

ui.TOWEROFTRIAL_RULEDESC:
At the Tower of Trial, you may use [ Units in your Current Team ] and [ Units in the Time Shop ] to go up the floors one by one.
[ Features ]
Both unit levels and enhancement levels are disregarded. Artifact and Tribe buffs are also not applied.
# The floor challenges are randomized and reset every three days. When this occurs, the defenders of each floor are changed.
# Orc is superior to Human, Human, to Elf, Elf to Undead, and Undead to Orc. ( Orc > Human > Elf > Undead > Orc )
# Yellow circles on the icon of an enemy defender signify physical immunity. Blue circle icons signify magical immunity.
# A plus (+) on the icon of an enemy refers to elite, double (++) to upper elite, and triple (+++) to the best elite unit. An elite unit is more powerful than a normal unit.
# If you clean each floor, a reward is given.

ui.OFFLINE_KNIGHTAGELEVEL: - Knight Level : The level of your knight starts from 1 and goes up by one level per 100 stages you have conquered. NOTE: Levels are only applied once you have revived. When your level is 1, unit attack power of your tribe increases by 50% in scenario and dungeons. These bonuses increases by 10% every time your level increases.
ui.OFFLINE_TITLE: Offline March ( Your team keeps battling after the game is closed. )
ui.OFFLINE_MAXSTAGEDESC:
The [ Max Available Stage ] becomes the min value among physical max stage, magical max stage and air max stage.
# Physical max stage becomes the max value among the ( gold level + enhance level ) of all physical units. # Magical max stage becomes the max value among the ( gold level + enhance level ) of all magical units. # Air max stage becomes the max value among the ( gold level + enhance level ) of all air units.
ui.OFFLINE_UPGRADEDESC: # Your marching speed goes up if you upgrade [ The Potion of Marching ] or aquire any units which elevate [ March Speed ].

ui.GUILDBARRACK_DESC2: Though you don't select units separately, they can be trained automatically.
ui.GUILDBARRACK_DESC3: If you can train the upper level units (Evolve Unit, Elite Unit), the rate of upper level unit will increase as time goes by (Maximum ###)
ui.GUILDBARRACK_DESC4: When using units in Guild War (attack/defense) or Guild Raid, all units that are unlocked by type participate in the battle. For example, if you select infantries among 20 infantries, 15 evolved infantries, 10 elite infantries and 5 senior infantries, regardless of whether they are evolved or elite, all infantries (evolved/elite..) participate in the battle.
ui.GUILDBARRACK_DESC5: When using units in Guild War (attack/defense) or Guild Raid, regardless of Victory or Defeat, all units have been participated in the battle disappear.
ui.GUILDBARRACK_CONDITION1: Training is available if you unlock Barracks.
ui.GUILDBARRACK_CONDITION2: If there is evolved instructor, you can train evolved units.
ui.GUILDBARRACK_CONDITION3: If there is transcended 1 instructor, you can train elite units (+).
ui.GUILDBARRACK_CONDITION4: If there is transcended 2 instructor, you can train upper elite units (++).
ui.GUILDBARRACK_CONDITION5: If there is transcended 3 instructor, you can train the best elite units (+++).
ui.GUILDBARRACK_INSTRUCTORDESC: - You can select up to 5 instructors. - 5 instructors are selected automatically in the order of evolution or transcendence. - Though it is not included in the team and only exists in Time Shop, it can be selected as instructor.
ui.GUILDBARRACK_INSTRUCTORDESCDETAIL: [ Description of Instructor by Grade ] # 5 star - Increase the training speed by 20% # 6 star - Increase the training speed by 40% - Able to train evolved units # Trans 1 - Increase the training speed by 60% - Able to train elite units (+) # Trans 2 - Increase the training speed by 80% - Able to train upper elite units (++) # Trans 3 - Increase the training speed by 100% - Able to train best elite units (+++)
ui.GUILDWAR_HEROANDBARRACKDESC:
[ Detailed Description ]
# The level of heroes and units participating in Guild War becomes [ Knight Level ].
# Each hero can only select units in the same tribe as subordinates.
# Regardless of wining or losing, all unit (guild units) have been participated in the battle disappears.
# If you select a unit, all of the general/evolved/elite (+,++,+++) are selected. (ex) If you select Fire Bird, evolved Fire Bird, elite Fire Bird are all selected at once.
ui.GUILD_NOATTENDANCEDATA: You have never checked in since you joined guild.
ui.GUILDWAR_RULEDESC1: # Guild War starts automatically every 12 hours, twice a day. ( UTC 9:00 a.m., 9:00 p.m.) # Guild War lasts for 24 hours after starting. (Ends after 24 hours) # Guild War matching automatically sets matches in the server according to ranking. # After Guild War ends, the leader or co-leader must press the Reward button within 24 hours to receive any rewards. # The guild that takes more flags before the end of the Guild War wins. # When tied in flags, the guild with the lower Guild War score wins. # All users that win in the Guild War (by using 1 or more tickets) receive 60 Guild Coins and 60 Guild Points. Members of the losing guild receive 15 Guild Coins and 15 Guild Points. # When a guild wins in the Guild War, the guild will receive 2,500 Guild Stamps and 2,500 Guild Points. The losing guild receives 700 Guild Stamps and 700 Guild Points. # Newly joined members can only participate in Guild Wars that began after the user joined the guild. In other words, new members cannot participate in Guild Wars that started before joining the guild. # If there are too few guild members, there is a penalty in the Guild War rankings. In other words, even if you win, the guild will get fewer points. (25 people or more get 100%. 20 - 24 get only 80%, 15 - 19 get 60%, 10 - 14 get 40%, and 5 - 9 get 20%.)
ui.GUILDWAR_RULEDESC2: # The battle between each user in Guild War is called Guild Battle. # The level of heroes and units participating in Guild Battle becomes [ Knight Level ] ( Disregards Enhancement level and Gold level ) # All users start with 2 flags. # All users possess two attacks. ( Able to attack 2 times at maximum ) # In case you win by attacking the opponent, you take away its flag. # In case the opponent attacks you and you fail to defend, your flag is taken away. # You cannot attack the users whose 2 flags are all taken away. # In Guild War, 5 heroes and 5 types of guild units battle. # Guild units can be produced at [ Building > Guild Barrack ]. # Guild defense can be set at [ Building > Defense Base ], and if it is not set, it is automatically selected randomly. # If you win by attacking, you receive 20 gems, and if you win by defending, you receive 10 gems as a reward.

ui.PET_HIGHLANDOFSPRITEDESC:
At Spirit Highlands, you may use [ Units in Current Team ] and [ Units in Time Shop ] to clear stages one at a time, and obtain[ Pet Fragments ].
[ Features ]
# 10 entry tickets are given out daily, and they are only used up if you win in battle. # If you clear the stage with 3 stars, you can use Fight Now to win immediately without fighting and obtain items. # Unit levels and strengthening are disregarded, while artifact buffs and tribal buffs do not apply. # Orc is superior to Human, Human to Elf, Elf to Undead and Undead to Orc. ( Orc > Human > Elf > Undead > Orc ) # Yellow circle on the icon of an enemy defender refers to physical immunity, and blue circle refers to magic immunity. # + on the icon of an enemy defender refers to elite, ++ to upper elite and +++ to the best elite unit. An elite unit is more powerful than a normal unit.

ui.RAID_RAIDUNITDESC:
[ Description ]
# Hero and unit levels participating in the raid will be at the [Knightage Level]. # Heroes can only set units of the same race as their soldiers. # Units (guild units) participating in battle will disappear, regardless of victory/loss. # Select unit and regular/evolved/elite (+,++,+++) will all be selected. For example, if you select Fire Bird, then evolved Fire Bird and elite Fire Bird are all selected at once
ui.RAID_BATTLEDESC1: # Raids can be started by the Leader, Co-Leader and Elder. # Receive Guild Coins as [participation reward] every time you participate in raids. # Clear a raid to receive Raid Coins, Pet Fragments, Guild Stamps, or Gems as [clear reward]. (Clear reward can only be received 24 hours after joining the guild) # A raid is categorized as a [main raid] depending on the [area name], and the [main raid] is made up of [sub-raids] with various difficulty levels. # All guild members can participate in each [main raid] twice a day. # [Sub-raid] is made up of four bosses. It will close after a certain amount of time once it opens, so the bosses must be attacked within the given time. # The [Main raid] will start with [Ancient Ruins], and more will be added. # You cannot open more than two [Raids] at once. # If the raid seems to be too difficult, then the Leader, Co-Leader or, Elder can [give up] on the current raid. # By clearing the boss of the raid, user will receive a [clear reward]. The rewards differ depending on the damage ranking. (Raid Coin/Guild Coin/Gem rewards differ, but Pet Fragments are same.) (1st: 100% bonus, Top 10%: 80% bonus, Top 20%: 60% bonus, Top 30%: 40% bonus, Top 40%: 20% bonus, Others: 0%) Also, the user who made the final hit will receive a 100% additional bonus. The ranking bonus and final boss kill reward do not stack, and only the bigger bonus of the two will be added. # You can earn raid Pet Fragments in a [raid], and once the pet becomes 5 stars, you can get a [Legendary Artifacts]. There are four Artifacts for each raid, and once the Artifacts are all gathered, an excellent set effect will be given.
ui.RAID_BATTLEDESC2: # Raid battles are where users challenge bosses in a raid. # The level of the heroes and units participating in raids is [Knight Level]. (Enhancement level and gold level are ignored.) # Two tickets for participating in [main raids] are given each day. # Each battle goes on for [1 minute, 30 seconds], and one person can battle at a time. (The next user can enter after the battle of the previous user ends and the results are sent to the server.) # The battle results must be sent to the server within [3 minutes] of starting the battle. (During a raid battle, if the user becomes disabled for more than 3 minutes due to a phone call or other apps, or if the network is cut off for more than 3 minutes and the results are not sent to the server, then the ticket will be used and the battle will be canceled.) # You can take up to 3 raid skills to raids. # Battles in raids involve five heroes and five types of guild units. # Guild units can be made at [Building > Guild Barrack]. # Bosses have different buffs/debuffs depending on race, and they are also resistant against short/long range damage. # Battles with bosses go on for [1 minute, 30 seconds], and their attack power becomes stronger with time. # In raid battles, the game speed is always 2x, regardless of the current game speed.

Enjoy Endless Frontier again today. Thank you.

ui.GUILDWAR_RULEDESC11: # Guild War starts automatically every 12 hours, twice a day. ( UTC 9:00 a.m., 9:00 p.m.) # Guild War lasts for 24 hours after starting. (Ends after 24 hours) # Guild War matching automatically sets matches in the server according to ranking. # After Guild War ends, the leader or co-leader must press the Reward button within 24 hours to receive any rewards. # The guild that takes more flags before the end of the Guild War wins. # When tied in flags, the guild with the lower Guild War score wins. # All users that win in the Guild War (by using 1 or more tickets) receive 60 Guild Coins and 60 Guild Points. Members of the losing guild receive 15 Guild Coins and 15 Guild Points. # When a guild wins in the Guild War, the guild will receive 1,500 Guild Stamps and 1,500 Guild Points. The losing guild receives 300 Guild Stamps and 300 Guild Points. # Newly joined members can only participate in Guild Wars that began after the user joined the guild. In other words, new members cannot participate in Guild Wars that started before joining the guild. # If there are too few guild members, there is a penalty in the Guild War rankings. In other words, even if you win, the guild will get fewer points. (25 people or more get 100%. 20 - 24 get only 80%, 15 - 19 get 60%, 10 - 14 get 40%, and 5 - 9 get 20%.)
ui.BREAKTIME_NOINFO: No revival info. Revive first, and then use the [Spirit Rest] menu.
ui.BREAKTIME_DESC1:
- Spirit Rest is when units stop marching and take a rest. - While resting, you can earn medals. - The formula for medals earned during Spirit Rest is as follows.
Earned medals = Rest time (minutes) x no. of medals per minute x 0.9
- [Rest time] is the time from starting to ending Spirit Rest, and up to four hours are allowed. - [No. of medals per minute] is the number of medals earned per minute for the most efficient instance. However, when the minimal Revival time is under 20 minutes, it is ignored. Bonuses for 100% additionally acquired medals using 500 Gems and medals acquired from additional medal events are excluded from calculation. - For example, when a total of four Revivals were made, no additional medal events were available, and when only No. (4) used 500 Gems for 100% additional medals, the [no. of medals per minute] would be as follows.
ui.BREAKTIME_DESC2: - No. (3) has a Revival time of less than 20 minutes, so it would be ignored and the [no. of medals per minute] would be 0. - No. (4) ignores the 500 Gem medal buff and additional medal event, so the acquired medals would be calculated as 30,000, and the [no. of medals per minute] becomes 1,000. - When reviving four times as shown above, the [no. of medals per minute] will be 2,000, which has the best efficiency. # In this case, when taking a Spirit Rest for three hours, the user will get 180 minutes x 2,000 x 0.9 = 324,000 medals. For a Spirit Rest of five hours, the user will get 240 minutes x 2,000 x 0.9 = 432,000 medals. (The user would receive medals for a maximum of four hours.)
ui.BREAKTIME_DESC3: - Even during Spirit Rest, you can participate in Battle Arena, Guild Wars, Guild Raids, Spirit Highlands, Tower of Trials, and dungeons. - After 8 hours upon ending Spirit Rest, you can rest again.
ui.BREAKTIME_FORMULAR: ※Acquired medals = rest time (minutes) x no. of medals per minute x 0.9
ui.BREAKTIME_DESC: You can earn medals while resting after ending the game.

ui.STATISTICS_ETCSPIRITAWAKENINGREF: 1. Can obtain through 5th Honor Units. (Pilot, Alchemist, Lich, Wyvern Rider) 2. [Spirit Awakening] is cumulative, but the maximum level-up for units cannot increase more than +100. It is activated even when the unit is in Time Shop. 3. When the 5th Honor Unit is awakened, the Limit Break of Spirit Awakening becomes possible. 4. For the Limit Break of Spirit Awakening, the maximum value of Sprit Awakening increases by 5 per 6-star unit by different 5th Honor Unit types, and this value cannot exceed 25. 5. Through the Limit Break of Spirit Awakening, the maximum level of units can increase up to 200.
ui.STATISTICS_ETCINNERPASSIONREF: 1. Can obtain through 6th Honor Units. (Steam Punk, Sylphid, Medusa, Naga) 2. [Inner Passion] can only be used in stages. [Inner Passion] is cumulative, but the unit abilities cannot increase to more than +100 level. It is activated even when the unit is in Time Shop. 3. When the 6th Honor Unit is awakened, the Limit Break of Inner Passion becomes possible. 4. For the Limit Break of Inner Passion, the maximum value of Inner Passion increases by 5 per 6-star unit by different 6th Honor Unit types, and this value cannot exceed 50. 5. Through the Limit Break of Inner Passion, the maximum abilities of units through Inner Passion can increase +300 levels.

5-star, 6-star, and 7-star artifacts can be transcended.
[Features]
# If you own more than 15 7-star Artifacts, you can transcend 7-star Artifacts.
# If you own more than 20 6-star Artifacts, you can transcend 6-star Artifacts.
# If you own more than 20 5-star Artifacts, you can transcend 5-star Artifacts.
# Each Artifact can only be transcended once a day.
# If you trandscend all of 6-star Artifacts with 1 Trans, you can transcend 6-star Artifacts with 2 Trans.
# If you trandscend all of 5-star Artifacts with 1 Trans, you can trandscend 5-star Artifacts with 2 Trans.

ui.STAGE_OUTLANDDISTORTIONDESC2:
# From 20001 stage, Outland Distortion will worsen to interrupt your stages.
# Only units with enhance level 8,000 or above can participate in the combat.
# Outland distortion will lower the basic game speed by 100% and reduce your game speed time. (Basic game speed will become slower as you go up the stages.)
# From 10001 stage, if your basic game speed is 180%, then it will be applied as 80%. If it is 230%, it would be 130%, but only 100% would be applied as the max value.
ui.OUTLAND_BATTLEDESC:
Outland Battle is stage based boss-clearing raid content using [currently owned soldiers] and [soldiers at Time Shop].
[ Features ]
# Both unit levels and enhancement levels are disregarded. Artifact and Tribe buffs are also not applied.
# The stage challenges are randomized and reset every five days. When this occurs, each stage's boss and available friendly soldier may change. (4 Entry tickets will be given each day)
# Combat Bosses with maximum 7 heroes and each hero's soldiers.
# Only units that can evolve to 6-stars can be selected as heroes.
# Maximum amount of soldiers to bring depends on the hero's evolution and transcendence status. (5-star: 10, 6-star: 12, 1 Trans: 15, 2 Trans: 17, 3 Trans: 20)
# Soldiers are selected by each type. For example, if you select human infantry for soldiers, all infantry (evolved infantry/1 trans/2trans/3trans infantry) will be selected. Higher trans level will be selected first.
# If you select 3 Trans hero, you can bring up to 20 soldiers, however if there are less than 20 soldiers on Time Shop, it will only take what you have. If you have more than 20 soldiers, it will take higher trans level soldiers first.
# Allowed soldiers to take may change by each stage. Also, some soldiers may participate as Elite soldiers. Elite soldiers will be displayed as +, ++, +++ on selection screen.
# Soldier's stat increases depending on Pet Fragments. If you have 7 Infantry Pet Fragments, infantry's stat will increase by 7%, and if infantry pet is 2-star 7 fragments, infantry's stat will increase by 37%. Maximum Pet Fragment effect is 330%."
ui.OUTLAND_ASKEXIT: Would you like to give up the battle?
ui.OUTLAND_SOLDIERDESC:
[soldier Explanation]
# Soldiers in Time Shop will participate the battle. # Heroes can only bring soldiers of the same tribe. # Maximum amount of soldiers to bring depends on the hero's evolution and transcendence status. (5-star: 10, 6-star: 12, 1 Trans: 15, 2 Trans: 17, 3 Trans: 20)

ui.OFFLINE_UPGRADEMETHOD: # How can I speed up my Offline March?
ui.OFFLINE_METHOD1: Buy the [Potion of Marching] in Premium Shop.
ui.OFFLINE_METHOD2: Get the 3rd Honor units: Griffin Rider, Forest Guardian, Succubus and Sorcerer.
ui.OFFLINE_METHOD3: And then, awaken these 3rd Honor units.
ui.FRIENDSHIP_DESC: # When you revive with higher Tribe Friendliness, you will get more medals.
ui.FRIENDSHIP_DESC2: If you revive from Human Hero and your Human Friendliness is 500, you will get 500% extra medals.
ui.FRIENDSHIP_DESC3: If you revive from Orc Hero and your Orc Friendliness is 350, you will get 350% extra medals.
ui.FRIENDSHIP_UPDESCTITLE: # How can I get Tribe Friendliness points?
ui.FRIENDSHIP_UPDESC: Get the 10th Honor units: Winged Knight, Windwalker, Abyss Mage and Siren. They increases their own tribe's Friendliness by 10 points for each 5-star unit and 20 points for each 6-star unit. You can get 400 points for each tribe by the 10th Honor units, at most.
ui.FRIENDSHIP_UPDESC2: And then, get the Couple Pets of the 10th Honor units for more points.
ui.FRIENDSHIP_DESC4: # You can buy special items in Tribe Shop when you get enough points.
ui.TRIBESHOP_ITEM1: +1 to Maximum number of Artifact Slots
ui.TRIBESHOP_ITEM2: +1 to Maximum number of Daily tickets for [Spirit Highlands]
ui.TRIBESHOP_ITEM3: +1 to Maximum number of Quests(This will unlock the hidden Quest.)
ui.TRIBESHOP_ITEM4: +2 to Maximum number of Daily tickets for [Outland Battle]
ui.TREASURE_TRANSFERERROR: You cannot choose an artifact with 0 limit break.
ui.TREASURE_TRANSFERERROR3: You have selected the Artifact with 0 limit break. You must select an Artifact with 1 limit break at least.
ui.TREASURE_TRANSFERDESC4: [NOTICE] This will reset the source Artifact(the Limit Break and the level will be 0). Then, all Dungeon Materials will be returned, but only 3,000 Honor Coins will be returned, at most(You cannot transfer when the expect loss exceeds 30,000 Honor Coins).
ui.TREASURE_TRANSFERDESC5: It costs 1,000 Gems to transfer the [Limit Break] of the Artifact.
ui.TREASURE_TRANSFERCONFIRMMSG: Are you sure to transfer the [Limit Break] of the Artifact?
ui.TREASURE_TRANSFERERROR4: The source Artifact and the target Artifact are identical. Select two distinct Artifacts.
ui.TREASURE_TRANSFERERROR5: An error occurred. The transfer has been cancelled.
ui.TREASURE_TRANSFERDESC6: You cannot transfer when the expect loss exceeds 30,000 Honor Coins
ui.TREASURE_TRANSFERDESC7: Not enough Honor Coins returned from the source Artifact to increase the maximum level of the target Artifact.
ui.TREASURE_TRANSFERERROR6: The [Limit Break] of the target Artifact is already maxed out.
ui.TRIBESHOP_ITEM5DESC: [Offline March] is your team's Stage progress after you left the game.
ui.MAILBOX_RECEIVEATONCEASK: Do you want to receive all gifts from your Inbox?
ui.MAILBOX_RECEIVEPRESENTCOMPLETE: There are no messages with gifts in your Inbox.
ui.MAILBOX_RECEIVEATONCENONE: There are no messages which you can [Receive All Gifts] from.
ui.MAILBOX_RECEIVEATONCEDESC1: You must click each message to receive the gifts which contains a unit, an artifact or a pet.
ui.MAILBOX_RECEIVEATONCEDESC2: You can check your Gem bonus tickets on <My Bonus Gem Tickets>.
ui.TREASURE_DETAILDESC1: To increase the maximum level of an artifact, you can get back Honor Coins that you have already used on other artifacts, Click the [?] icon for more details.
ui.TREASURE_DETAILDESC2: 1. Select two Artifacts for the Transfer; the Source Artifact and the Target Artifact. 2. The Limit Break of the Source will be 0 on the Transfer. 3. The Limit Break of the Target will be increased by the Honor Coins which were once used to increase that of the Source. 4. At that time, you will get back 3,000 Honor Coins at most, and you will lose the rest. 5. If, however, the expected loss exceeds 30,000, you cannot transfer. 6. The level of the Source will be 0 on the Transfer and you will get back the whole Dungeon Materials. 7. The level of the Target does not change on the Transfer.
